name: Venture in The Dark
description:
Venture in the dark is a 2D horror story driven platformer game in which the player's car breaks down in the middle of nowhere. Will you survive?

STORY

When your car breaks down in the middle of nowhere, you must find shelter somewhere. Whilst looking, you find clues that show that someone or something has been there recently and something very sinister and dark has happened, will you piece together the jigzaw and find out what has happened or will the venture in the darkness be to much for you?

Find out the answers to these and other questions when you thumbs up this game! Thanks!

PLEASE BARE IN MIND THIS GAME ISN'T DONE! IF YOU DO DOWNLOAD, PLEASE EXPECT AN UNFINISHED GAME!!!!!!!

MUSIC, CARNIVAL OF TEARS 2: INTO THE LIGHT by Matt Oakley is licensed under a Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License.
